publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4059 Linda Fabiani: Stop the Traffik—That the Parliament supports the "Stop the Traffik" campaign due to be launched in the European Parliament on 21 March 2006 seeking the end of human trafficking; calls for a renewed effort to end the trafficking of people, and calls on all of Scotland’s people to support the campaign.
S2M-4059 Stop the Traffik (lodged on 3 March 2006) Rob Gibson*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-4059 Stop the Traffik (lodged on 3 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*
S2M-4059 Stop the Traffik (lodged on 3 March 2006) John Swinburne*
S2M-4059 Stop the Traffik (lodged on 3 March 2006) Irene Oldfather*

S2M-4059 Stop the Traffik (lodged on 3 March 2006) Richard Lochhead*, Pauline McNeill*, Eleanor Scott*, Brian Adam*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Bill Butler*, Rosie Kane*, Marlyn Glen*, Jackie Baillie*, Stewart Stevenson*, Margaret Jamieson*, Frances Curran*, Carolyn Leckie*, Jim Mather*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Murray Tosh*, Tommy Sheridan*, Shiona Baird*, Patrick Harvie*, Christine May*, Bruce Crawford*, Trish Godman*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-4059 Stop the Traffik (lodged on 3 March 2006) Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Robin Harper*, Chris Ballance*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-4059 Stop the Traffik (lodged on 3 March 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4059 Stop the Traffik (lodged on 3 March 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
